page.title: 11My Home _ by Michelle.
page.content: I live in a semi-detached bungalow at 1, Rectory Close, with my parents, two brothers and my pets. The bungalow has three bedrooms, a big kitchen, a lounge and Daddy has built an extension. When I get home from school I change into a dress but if its cold I wear a jumper and trousers. On cold days I like coming home to a cosy fire to read my books. On hot days I sit in the garden and draw. I like coming home to see my two parents, my brothers and saying "Hello" to my pets. I like watching television but I also like to play with my friend, another Michelle. Sometimes I cook my own tea. I like to go for walks over the woods and I look forward to the weekends when I visit my relations.
